doc.title: Bald Dad
doc.plot: 'Mum said we don't live with Dad because he's a bit irresponsible. I knew that was true because of the time he took me and Pepsi camping'. Memories of a father-son relationship examining the mountains children make of molehills. A non-story about Pepsi licking cow-pats, druids, being licked by a cow and losing the dog.
